item.title: Canada investigates whether Tesla wrongfully helped itself to a subsidy-fueled sales boom
item.description: Tesla sold the equivalent of about 18% of its annual volumes in Canada in just three days across four stores with the help of $30 million in subsidies...

item.title: Walmart CEO Doug McMillon says customers are exhibiting ‘stressed behaviors’—and it’s already tanked the company’s valuation by $22 billion
item.description: The retailer’s stock dropped on the news that consumer confidence had hit a 12-year low.

item.title: Amazon allure grows with shares now cheaper than Apple and Walmart
item.description: “You’d be hard pressed to look at Amazon’s multiple here and not see it as appealing," said Clayton Allison, portfolio manager at Prime Capital Financ...

item.title: Don’t water down Europe’s AI rules to please Trump, EU lawmakers warn
item.description: "It would never be enough," AI Act lead negotiator Brando Benifei tells Fortune of any effort to appease the Trump White House

item.title: Leaked text messages reveal the U.S. bombed the Houthis’ ‘top missile guy’ as he was ‘walking into his girlfriend’s building’
item.description: The newly released messages reveal how top U.S. officials planned military strikes against terrorists in Yemen.
